import './App.css' import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { BrowserRouter as Router, Switch, Route } from 'react-router-dom' import Home from './pages/Home.js' import ScrollToTop from './utils/ScrollToTop' import Modal from 'react-modal' import CompilerPyCpp from './pages/CompilerPyCpp' import EditorHtmlJS from './pages/EditorHtmlJS' require('dotenv').config() Modal.setAppElement('#root') //Necessary for settings modal export const AuthContext = React.createContext() const App = () => { useEffect(() => { const loggedInUser = localStorage.getItem('user') if (loggedInUser) { const foundUser = JSON.parse(loggedInUser) setUser(foundUser) } }, []) return (
) } export default App
